alternativeNames: Noé, Frank de; de Noé, François Thomas [Frank]
comments: Collected in North Africa and Canary Islands, particularly Labiatae.  In list of members of the Soc. Bot. France from first bulletin of 1854 until 1871
examples: Clinopodium villosum de Noe in Bull. Soc. Bot. France, 2: 580 (1855).
source: Barnhart. See also Bull. Soc. Bot. France, 4: 288 (1857) (Monsieur le comte Frank de Noe). Also appeared with title 'Vicomte' and 'Marquis'. Variant name & dates from: Karl-Heinz Neuwirth
